document_data.name: the Triple Legion
document_data.mainbody: The '''Triple Legion''' was a mercenary organization within the [[Sevenfold Mazework]] of the [[Great Dismal Delve]].
document_data.Organization: The Triple Legion was made-up of 800 [[xorn]] mercenaries.
document_data.Activities: This mercenary group was used by the [[dao]] for scouting and spy missions. They were well-paid but not trusted. The dao kept them far from the palace of the [[Kabril Ali al-Sara al-Zalazil|Great Khan]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Sevenfold Mazework within the Great Dismal Delve served as base of all dao military organizations.
